Henry Schein to acquire Merritt Veterinary Supplies, expand U.S. presence - Veterinary Practice News
s: August 30, 2017 - Henry Schein Inc., a provider of health care products and services to animal health practitioners, announced its plans to acquire Merritt Veterinary Supplies Inc., a family-owned supplier of animal health products. Merritt serves approximately 4,500 veterinary clinics across the eastern U.S.
